original_text: Believers in other churches gave money to me so that I could serve you. It is like I was robbing them so that I could help you.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 섬기기 위하여 다른 여러 교회에서 비용을 받은 것은 탈취한 것이라

sentences.original_text: Believers in other churches gave money to me
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 교회의 신자들이 나에게 돈을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: so that I could serve you
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 여러분을 섬길 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: It is like I was robbing them
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 내가 그들을 털고 있는 것 같습니다

sentences.original_text: so that I could help you
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 여러분을 도울 수 있도록
